description.value:
Includes 5 Demolition Charges (Krak Grenade or Demo Charge Statline), 5 Binary Charges, 100 metres of Det-Cord that burns at one metre per 10 seconds, 5 simple pressure-release detonators. Good Kits include variable burn det-cord and advanced detonators that trigger from motion or thermal imaging.

Requirements

Kit can be refilled without Requisiton Test as long as having access to appropriate restocking.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
